languages.text: "Все сделки и важные решения проводятся и принимаются в столице. Много лет назад предок Ее Светлости Леди Теодоры подписал соглашение с Адептус Администратум, позволившее наладить эффективное управление миром и сопредельными системами. По указу часть населения планеты была отдана в пользование ведомству и переделана в сервиторов-писарей. Сейчас они трудятся по всему миру".

traits.locale_text: "Все сделки и важные решения проводятся и принимаются в столице. Много лет назад предок Ее Светлости леди Теодоры подписал соглашение с Адептус Администратум, позволившее наладить эффективное управление миром и сопредельными системами. По указу часть населения планеты была отдана в пользование ведомству и переделана в сервиторов-писарей. Сейчас они трудятся по всему миру".

languages.text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."
languages.original_text: "Все сделки и важные решения проводятся и принимаются в столице. Много лет назад предок Ее Светлости Леди Теодоры подписал соглашение с Адептус Администратум, позволившее наладить эффективное управление миром и сопредельными системами. По указу часть населения планеты была отдана в пользование ведомству и переделана в сервиторов-писарей. Сейчас они трудятся по всему миру".

traits.locale_text: "All decisions and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora's signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighboring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and processed into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

"All decisions and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora's signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighboring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and processed into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

"All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

"All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

languages.text: “所有交易与重要的决定，都是在首都这边进行的。许多年前，西奥多拉夫人的先人与帝国内政部签署了一项协议，得到了这个世界与邻近星系的管理权。根据协议，这颗行星的一部分人口归帝国内政部管理。他们被改造成了机仆抄写员，如今在这个世界的各个角落辛勤工作。”
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: “所有交易与重要的决定，都是在首都这边进行的。许多年前，西奥多拉夫人的先人与帝国内政部签署了一项协议，得到了这个世界与邻近星系的管理权。根据协议，这颗行星的一部分人口归帝国内政部管理。他们被改造成了奴工抄写员，如今在这个世界的各个角落辛勤工作。”

languages.text: «Todos los grandes acuerdos y las decisiones importantes tienen lugar aquí, en la capital. Hace muchos años, uno de los antepasados de lady Theodora firmó un acuerdo con el Adeptus Administratum que permitía una gestión eficaz del planeta y los sistemas colindantes. Según el decreto, parte de la población del planeta fue asignada al Administratum y convertida en escribas servidores. Ahora trabajan por todo el mundo».
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los grandes acuerdos y las decisiones importantes tienen lugar aquí, en la capital. Hace muchos años, uno de los antepasados de lady Theodora firmó un acuerdo con el Adeptus Administratum que permitía una gestión eficaz del planeta y los sistemas colindantes. Según el decreto, parte de la población del planeta fue asignada al Administratum y convertida en escribas servidores. Ahora trabajan por todo el mundo».

languages.text: 「あらゆる取引や重要な決断は、ここ首都で行われます。何年も前、シオドーラ様の祖先が帝国行政局と協定を結び、この惑星と近隣の星系を効率良く管理することを可能にしました。その法令に従い、この惑星の人口の一部が帝国行政局に割り当てられ、サーヴィターの記録官に転換されました。彼らは現在、惑星の各地で労働に従事しています」
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる取引や重要な決断は、ここ首都で行われます。何年も前、シオドーラ様の祖先が帝国行政局と協定を結び、この惑星と近隣の星系を効率良く管理することを可能にしました。その法令に従い、この惑星の人口の一部が帝国行政局に割り当てられ、サーヴィターの記録官に転換されました。彼らは現在、惑星の各地で労働に従事しています」

languages.text: "Alle Abkommen und wichtigen Entscheidungen werden hier in der Hauptstadt getroffen. Vor vielen Jahren unterschrieb ein Vorfahre von Lady Theodora eine Übereinkunft mit dem Adeptus Administratum, die eine effiziente Verwaltung der Welt und Nachbarsysteme ermöglichte. Gemäß dieses Erlasses wurde ein Anteil der Bevölkerung des Planeten dem Administratum zugeteilt und in Servitor-Schreiber umgewandelt. Sie arbeiten jetzt auf der ganzen Welt."
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Abkommen und wichtigen Entscheidungen werden hier in der Hauptstadt getroffen. Vor vielen Jahren unterschrieb ein Vorfahre von Lady Theodora eine Übereinkunft mit dem Adeptus Administratum, die eine effiziente Verwaltung der Welt und Nachbarsysteme ermöglichte. Gemäß dieses Erlasses wurde ein Anteil der Bevölkerung des Planeten dem Administratum zugeteilt und in Servitor-Schreiber umgewandelt. Sie arbeiten jetzt auf der ganzen Welt."

languages.text: « C'est ici, dans la capitale, que sont conclus les accords importants ou prises les décisions cruciales. Il y a bien des années, un ancêtre de dame Théodora a signé un traité avec l'Adeptus Administratum, ce qui a permis de faciliter de manière drastique la gestion du monde et des systèmes voisins. En échange, une fraction de la population de la planète a été assignée à l'Administratum et convertie en servitors scribes. Aujourd'hui, ils officient dans le monde entier. »
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ici, dans la capitale, que sont conclus les accords importants ou prises les décisions cruciales. Il y a bien des années, un ancêtre de dame Théodora a signé un traité avec l'Adeptus Administratum, ce qui a permis de faciliter de manière drastique la gestion du monde et des systèmes voisins. En échange, une fraction de la population de la planète a été assignée à l'Administratum et convertie en servitors scribes. Aujourd'hui, ils officient dans le monde entier. »

languages.text: "Tüm anlaşmalar ve önemli kararlar, başkentte yapılır ve alınır. Yıllar önce Leydi Theodora'nın bir atası, Adeptus Administratum'la bir anlaşma imzalayarak bu dünyanın ve komşu sistemlerin daha verimli bir şekilde yönetilmesini sağlamıştı. O kararname gereğince gezegenin nüfusunun bir kısmı Administratum'a tahsis edilmiş ve kâtip hizmetörlerine dönüştürülmüştü. Artık hepsi, bu dünyanın dört bir yanında iş görüyor."
languages.original_text: "All deals and important decisions are made here in the capital. Many years ago, an ancestor of Lady Theodora signed an agreement with the Adeptus Administratum which allowed for efficient management of the world and the neighbouring systems. In accordance with the decree, a share of the planet's population was assigned to the Administratum and converted into servitor scribes. They now toil across the entire world."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm anlaşmalar ve önemli kararlar, başkentte belli olur. Yıllar önce Leydi Theodora'nın bir atası, Adeptus Administratum'la bir anlaşma imzalayarak bu dünyanın ve komşu sistemlerin daha verimli bir şekilde yönetilmesini sağladı. O kararname gereğince, gezegenin nüfusunun bir kısmı Administratum'a tahsis edilmiş ve kâtip servitörlerine dönüştürülmüştü. Artık hepsi, bu dünyanın dört bir yanında didiniyor."
